        Helper method that will construct a basic query using the itemID from the provided game.
        Parameters:
        item - The CollectionItem we want to build a query for.
        Returns:
        Returns a BasicDBObject object that represents this query, or null if no game was provided

        Parameters:

      • convertCollectionToMongo

        public static com.mongodb.BasicDBObject convertCollectionToMongo(com.ac.games.data.Collection collection)
        Helper method that will construct a basic database object representing the provided data.
        Parameters:
        item - The object we want to add to the database.
        Returns:
        Returns a BasicDBObject object that represents this object, or null if nothing was provided

      • convertMongoToCollection

        public static com.ac.games.data.Collection convertMongoToCollection(com.mongodb.DBObject dbObject)
        Convert a Mongo BSON record back into a Collection object.
        Parameters:
        dbObject - The Mongo DBObject result
        Returns:
        a Collection object, or null if the dbObject was null
